channel.title: Musl on Layer9

item.title: Adelie Linux - LiveCD Installation
item.description: LiveCD 1.0-RC2, MATE edition Development of the Ad√©lie distro seemed to have stopped for a long time because the team dedicated themselves to the development of a graphical and scriptable setup program, called Horizon, and that took many resources off the development of the base system. There was much going on behind the scenes but from the outside all we could see was no new releases. However, a recent reorganization put wind in their sails and the site has been much improved, looking sharp, professional and organized, the mailing-lists make more sense, and progress seems to be accelerating.
